projects.title: ShopIt Ecommerce
projects.description: This e-commerce project was built with NextJS, Context API for state data management and Sanity for products data management. The project is responsive and user-friendly leaving a cool user experience. Items for sale are displayed in various categories from which their details can be viewed and the products are addded to cart. Paystack test payment checkout is integrated into the project. It is currently hosted on vercel.

projects.title: Thrive Ecommerce Admin Dashboard
projects.description: Developed using ReactJS, TailwindCSS and Context API for state data management, this awesome project utilises available dummy data to display an e-commerce admin dashboard. Features include several page elements: an order page, employee records page etc, apps: a kanban board, text editor,display information in bar charts, pie charts etc., and ability to change themes and toggle dark and light modes

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Developed this beautiful portfolio site using NextJS, TailwindCSS and Framer-motion. It showcases some projects I have worked on. Project data are fetched from the Next app API backend. Other features include responsive design, cool word animations and scroll animations using framer motion, dynamic display of project details, improroved usability and accessiblity using React tooltip etc.

projects.title: Talk-And-Show Africa Homepage
projects.description: Developed this visually stunning and responsive homepage of a movie marketing agency website. The site showcases latest series and movies, latest news, and more, according to provided user interface design. Implemented features include: responsive design, animations-for visual delight and an enjoyable user experience; movie Rating- integrated to easily fetch ratings from the backend; news and events section- for viewing the latest news and upcoming events; FAQs: answers to frequently asked questions about the movie agency, etc.

projects.title: Workit Landing Page
projects.description: Curved backgrounds are a beauty to behold in websites as they add some aesthetic viewing. I developed this landing page following a challenge at Dribble using HTML, plain CSS and the TailwindCSS library.
